1028.question: How is the quality of singing voice measured?

3-Table1-1.png: The quality of singing voice is measured using the NCC score.</s>
The quality of singing voice is measured using an automatic method, which includes various steps such as reconstruction, conversion, and then a final score is given.</s>
3-Table2-1.png: The quality of singing voice is measured using the MOS (Mean Opinion Score) scores.</s>
The quality of singing voice is measured using the MOS (Mean Opinion Score) scores.</s>

1028.answer:
Automatic: Normalized cross correlation (NCC)
Manual: Mean Opinion Score (MOS)
